src_original: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cême cittôtpādânumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittôtpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatrôpapatsyante tatra
tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś cârcitāś câpacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣûpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargôpapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
